Package socialmedia

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
socialmedia.Comment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Comment extends Post
Comment class inherts attributes from the Post class, as comments and posts share similar properties. However, a comment also keeps track of the identifier of the original post associated with the comment.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Comment

      public Comment(int id, String message, Account account)
      Constructs a new comment on a post within the system.

      Assumes the id points to an existing post that allows comments Assumes the message is a valid string

      Parameters:
      id - the int identifier of the post being commented on
      message - the message to be used on the comment
      account - the author of the comment

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The method creates a string showing clearly the state of the attributes of the comment class.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Post
      Returns:
      a String detailing comment's attributes.

    • removeOriginalPost

      public void removeOriginalPost()
      The method makes the comment an orphan, by removing its link with the parent post.

      Used when the post being commented on has been removed from the system.
